type TransportBindingElementImporter = class interface IWsdlImportExtension interface IPolicyImportExtension

summary.span: 从附加策略表达式的 Web Services Description Language (WSDL)（Web Services 描述语言）文档中导入标准传输绑定元素。

span.span: Imports standard transport binding elements from Web Services Description Language (WSDL) documents with attached policy expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TransportBindingElementImporter` 类型是 和 接口的实现。The `TransportBindingElementImporter` type is an implementation of the and interfaces. 它从 WSDL 服务元数据中导入 实例、 实例、 实例、 实例、 实例和 实例。It imports the , , , , , and instances from WSDL service metadata. 导入这些 类型时，`TransportBindingElementImporter` 类型还会从 WSDL 元数据导入寻址信息。When these types are imported, the `TransportBindingElementImporter` type also imports the addressing information from the WSDL metadata.

related.span: 导入 WCF 扩展的自定义元数据

span.span: Importing Custom Metadata for a WCF Extension

param.name: wsdlDocuments
param.span: 要导入的 WSDL 文档的集合。

span.span: The collection of WSDL documents that are to be imported.

param.name: xmlSchemas
param.span: 要导入的 XML 架构文档的集合。

span.span: The collection of XML Schema documents that are to be imported.

param.name: policy
param.span: 要导入的策略断言的集合。

span.span: The collection of policy assertions that are to be imported.

summary.span: 将自定义策略断言添加到要导入的 WSDL 文档中的 WSDL 绑定。

span.span: Adds custom policy assertions to the WSDL bindings in WSDL documents that are to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将策略表达式附加到已附加策略的 WSDL 绑定。This method attaches a policy expression to WSDL bindings that already have attached policies. 添加的策略表达式包含自定义策略断言，而该断言包含来自 SOAP 绑定的 SOAP 传输 URI。The added policy expression contains a custom policy assertion that contains the SOAP transport URI from the SOAP binding. 导入终结点时，会使用此策略断言来导入正确的传输绑定元素。This policy assertion is used when importing the endpoint to import the correct transport binding element.

span.span: The for the contract binding element.

summary.span: 如果尚未从附加到 WSDL 的策略导入 ，则从 WSDL 端口导入寻址信息，并从 SOAP 传输 URI 导入 或 。

span.span: Imports addressing information from the WSDL port and imports an or an from the SOAP transport URI if a is not already imported from policy attached to the WSDL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果导入的绑定包含未由此类型导入的 ，则此方法不会导入附加到 WSDL 的寻址信息。This method does not import addressing information attached to the WSDL if the imported binding contains a that is not imported by this type.
